content: or to sell vivian s shell hat begin sides of hat shell stitches round 1 *1 single_crochet in next st skip 2 st 5 double_crochet in next st skip 2 st* repeat between * * around join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet 11 total shells rnds 2 - 11 slip_stitch in the top of each of the next 3 double_crochet chain 1 1 single_crochet in the same st the 3rd double_crochet aka center of the shell skip 2 st 5 double_crochet in the next st the single_crochet of the previous round *skip 2 st single_crochet in the next st the top center st of the next shell of the previous round skip 2 st 5 double_crochet in the next st * repeat between * * around join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet 11 total shells cut yarn leaving enough yarn to weave in weave in all ends changing the hat size 1 to make the hat larger or smaller around change the number of rounds you do for the crown a to make the hat smaller do fewer rounds of single_crochet for the crown then start the shell rounds b to make the hat larger increase the number of rounds for the crown you will increase 6 stitches on each additional round in the same manner as in the pattern note each additional round will add one more single_crochet between the increases then start the shell rounds c note about the shell rounds for each round of the crown you do it will tell you how many shell stitches 5 double_crochet you will have for each round of shell stitches the shell pattern is a multiple of 6 stitches for example if you do 11 rounds of single_crochet for the crown 66 st you will have a total of 11 shells for each round on the sides of that hat if you do 14 rounds of single_crochet for the crown 72 st you will have 14 shells for each round on the sides of that hat 2 to make the hat shorter or longer for a shorter hat do fewer rounds of shell stitches to make it longer just add more rounds of shell stitches optional finishes 1 for your last round of shell stitches do 6 or 7 double_crochet shells this will cause your last round of shell stitches to flare out a bit 2 do 1 round of single_crochet after your last round of shell stitches 1 single_crochet in each st around page 2 of 2 designed by
